title: Forum Badges/Post history never updating?
body: Ever since I changed my IGN, my forum badges and any threads/replies I make are not saved. This is irritating because unless someone replies to me, I will not know if they did since there's no record shown under my profile.

replies.body:
I love you so much man! ( no homo )

Thanks! Hope you have a wonderful day and truly, thanks for the help.
I know that can be pretty frustrating to not see your profile, so we took a look into this for you.  Everything should be okay now!
